topic: $NAMESPACE_PUBLISHER/job_queue/workers/AAAAAAAA-1285-4E4C-A44E-AAAABBBB0000/job_finished: the uuid is the workers own $SERVICE_UUID

payload.reference_uuid: RRRRRRRR-1285-4E4C-A44E-RRRRBBBB0000: e.g. uuid of source video
payload.started_at: iso_time: set by this worker at start
payload.finished_at: iso_time: set by this worker at completion
payload.stdout: string: full stdout from ffmpeg subporcess
payload.stderr: string: full stderr from ffmpeg subprocess
